course.title: Gut Health Foundations Mini-Diploma
course.description: Your introduction to Gut Health. In just 45 minutes, you'll understand the core principles, discover how Gut Health can transform women struggling with digestive issues, and earn your Mini-Diploma certificate. Perfect for anyone wanting to explore Gut Health before committing to the full certification.

modules.title: Module 1: Introduction to Gut Health
modules.description: Discover what Gut Health is and why it's transforming the wellness industry

lessons.title: Welcome to Your Gut Health Journey
lessons.description: Your path to becoming a certified Gut Health practitioner starts here

lessons.title: What is Gut Health?
lessons.description: Understanding the core principles and philosophy of Gut Health

lessons.title: Why Gut Health Matters Now
lessons.description: The growing demand for Gut Health practitioners and how bloating, IBS, and digestive dysfunction affects millions

modules.title: Module 2: Core Principles of Gut Health
modules.description: Master the foundational concepts every Gut Health practitioner needs to know

lessons.title: The 5 Pillars of Gut Health
lessons.description: The essential framework for understanding Gut Health

lessons.title: How Gut Health Helps women struggling with digestive issues
lessons.description: Real-world applications and transformations through restored gut health and vitality

lessons.title: Common Myths Debunked
lessons.description: Separating fact from fiction in Gut Health

modules.title: Module 3: Your Path Forward
modules.description: Next steps to becoming a certified Gut Health practitioner

lessons.title: The Gut Health Practitioner Opportunity
lessons.description: Career paths, income potential, and impact you can make

lessons.title: Your Certification Roadmap
